title: Tassel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Tiny tassel of linen, braided and knotted. Single loop, attached to short stem and terminating in a round center from which hang clusters of knotted elements.
